name: Savior (itch) (ekin nohutçu, Senem, lmstrato)
description:
“There was a sacred fish before the humankind.. Now, its your chance to save the world…”

What is this game? It is an advanture game which took place in an ancient world. You have to save the Koi fish and carry him to The Pool of Life.

How to play? Use mouse to navigate and hold left click to dive. After diving release your left click when the bar is full to gain altitude. Collect air rings to increase your speed. Reach checkpoint pools to recover the fish.

Where did this idea came from? There are similar mechanics have been used in many AAA games like Batman: Arkham Series, Assassin’s Creed II, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban. But It was never a core mechanic. As flying is a core mechanic, we created wind zones and upgrades to support the gameplay.

What is the music? It is Lonely Bird by The Bulgarian Voices & Huun Huur Tu.
